alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fayette, northeastern Coweta and south central Fulton Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tyrone, or 7 miles west of Fayetteville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, Union City, Fairburn, Tyrone, Palmetto, Cannongate, and Sandy Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
